test.name: CT - Deve ser possivel acessar função de indicar amigors na seção de Descubra Mais

kw.name: Dado que o usuário está logado no aplicativo
Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Quando o usuário está na tela inicial
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Então deve ser possivel acessar a funcionalidade de indicar amigos
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Indique seus amigos Mostre aos seus amigos como é fácil ter uma vida sem burocracia."]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Indique seus amigos Mostre aos seus amigos como é fácil ter uma vida sem burocracia."]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Indique seus amigos Mostre aos seus amigos como é fácil ter uma vida sem burocracia."]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: E deve conseguir visualizar mais informações sobre indicar amigos
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[@content-desc="Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco Para cada indicação aceita, um amigo salvo da burocracia"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[@content-desc="Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco Para cada indicação aceita, um amigo salvo da burocracia"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[@content-desc="Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco Para cada indicação aceita, um amigo salvo da burocracia"]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword
Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.
